ygData.subject: Re: magical 2h-slashing (BIB)
ygData.msgSnippet: Well whatever, its still easier to get, My group has gotten several in a row everytime i went to camp it, I ve helped my lower lvl guild members get a few ...
ygData.messageBody:
Well whatever, its still easier to get, My group has gotten several in a row everytime i went to camp it, I've helped my lower lvl guild members get a few ...
Wes Lobdell,
Quote: +ACI-I don't want to achieve immortality through my work. I want to achieve
it through not dying.+ACI-
-Woody Allen
------------------------
My all time favorite Oxymorons:
exact estimate, plastic silverware, genuine imitation, mud bath, original copy, student teacher, alone together, anarchy rules, bitter sweet, bankrupt millionaire, black light, butt-head, casual sex, clean dirt, coed sorority, cold as hell, computer jock, constant change, cowardly lion, curved line(according to the mathematical definition of a line), delibrate mistake, dry wine, earth angel(ok thats just going back a ways +ADs-), educational television, even odds, found missing, freezer burn, fresh cheese, full-length bikini, half full, half naked, hard water, hells angels, idiot savant, jumbo shrimp, less is more, and finally my all time FAVORITE OXYMORON....: 'Microsoft works'+ACEAIQAhACEAIQAh-
-----Original Message-----
From: Allison Brannen mav+AEA-mav.nu
To: EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com EQCheats+AEA-onelist.com
Date: Wednesday, July 28, 1999 1:54 PM
Subject: RE: +AFs-EQCheats+AF0- magical 2h-slashing (BIB)


From: Allison Brannen mav+AEA-mav.nu

Unfortunately this is not quite true. I personally have witnessed the
Knight spawn 3 times. He had the BIB only once. The other 2
times it was just a fine steel weapon.

And wouldnt you know it, I was second in line to loot :)

--Aaldiana D'Ozz
High Elf Cleric of Bristlebane
Founder of HonorBound
http://mav.nu/hb

From: +ACI-Diina, David+ACI- DDiina+AEA-turn-keywny.com

I fully agree the BIB is much easier to get, the knight spawns about every
4 hours in my experience and he always has the sword.......the exp in that
room is great to and you tend to avoid evil eye trains.......unless some
blinded idiot wanders into the room with an EE chasing him (happened to my
party once) but if you are under lvl 28 or so I would recommend not
leaving the room.....(don't pull anything) just be patient and content
with room spawn and you should have no trouble..

Brennin
